section.title: Basic Actions in WCM
section.para: These actions can be done by users who have the right to use the administration bar with a personal preferences menu.

section.title: View a site
section.para: In WCM, we use the 'Website' term which is equivalent to the 'Portal' term. So, viewing a portal means viewing a website. You can select the site that you want to view by selecting the site name in the drop-down menu on the Administration bar:
The main screen of the site will appear like the illustration below:

callout.para: This is Administration bar which contains administration functions related to portals (websites).
This is Banner which contains slogan, logo, icon used in the website.
This is Home page which is the main page of the website. This is the default page that is displayed first when you visit the website.
This is Footer of the web site. It can be texts, or image that is displayed at the bottom of the web site. It provides information about author/institutional sponsor, revision date, copyright, etc.

note.title: Email
note.para: You should enter your email address exactly because when you forget username or password, you can recover it by using this email address.

Click the Login link at the top of the home page. The Sign in form will appear:

Click Sign in to accept, or Discard to exit the Sign in form.

section.title: Sign Out
section.para: The function lets you get back to the anonymous portal. It ends your current portal session.
To sign out, click the Logout link on the right access banner:
or click the Start logo at the top left corner of the administration bar and select the Sign out form from the menu:

section.title: Retrieve username/password
section.para: If you forget your account or password, you can recover them by doing as follows:

step.para: Click the link Forget your User Name/Password? from the Sign in form.
This form offers two options:

listitem.para: If you forgot your password, you need to select this option.
If you forgot your username, you need to select this option.

step.para: Select one of these two options in this form. The selected option will be shown:
If the Forgot my password option is selected:
If the Forgot my username option is selected:
Enter your username or email in the corresponding form.
Click Send to send the inputted values.
Once information has been sent, you will receive an email with your User name/ Password in your email address registered by you.

listitem.para: If you forget User Name: when a username is retrieved, your old username is restored and can be reused and a new password is also sent to your email with the old username.
If you forget old password: a new password will be set (as temporary, then you will be directed to change the password for the next time you sign in.

note.title: Temporary Credentials Validity
note.para: The Username/Password that you received only takes effect for 1 day. It means that if the period is over 1 day from the receipt date, you can not use the receipt username/password, so you will need to get another email active.

section.title: Change Account Information
section.para: The function allows changing your account information.
To change account information do as follows:

step.para: Click directly on your own account name to open the Account Profiles tab which enables you to change your account profile or password.
The Account Profiles tab will appear:
Select the Account Profiles tab.
This tab displays the current basic information of the user who has logged at the time.
Change your First Name, Last Name, Email. You cannot change your User Name.
Click Save to accept changes.
Select the Change Password tab.
Input your current password to identify that you are the owner of this account.
Input your new password, it must have at least 6 characters.
Input your password again in the Confirm New Password field.
Click Save to accept changes.

section.title: Change the skin of the current site
section.para: The eXo skins are attractive user interface styles for displaying a portal. Each skin has its own characteristics with different backgrounds, icons, etc. In order to use easily and effectively, you are allowed to change the skin of the current site.

step.para: Select the Change Skin item in the menu that appears when you move the cursor to the logo at the upper left corner:
The Skin Setting form appears.
Select the skin you want by clicking its name.
Click Apply and wait a few seconds to take affect.

section.title: Print a Web Content
section.para: Users can easily print any content in a site by following these steps:

step.para: Click Read more to read all the content of a document or an article in a site.
Click the Print button, the Print Preview page will be displayed on another tab.
Click the Print button to print the content of this page or Close to close this tab without printing.
